wikipedia_page.main: Sir Robert Hugh Kirk Marett,  (1907–1981) was a British author, businessman, civil servant, and diplomat. He was the Consul-General of the United Kingdom to Boston from 1955 to 1958, and the British Ambassador to Peru from 1963 to 1967.

response: * Robert Marett (diplomat) (1907–1981), British author and diplomat
